PresenceConfigDeclineReason.name: PresenceConfigDeclineReason
PresenceConfigDeclineReason.description: Represents the settings for a decline reason that a presence user provides when declining work.

PresenceDeclineReasonId.description: The ID of the PresenceDeclineReason record.

PresenceUserConfigId.description: The ID of the PresenceUserConfig record where the decline reasons are added.
